reg.acttitle: Land Act; Motor Vehicle (All Terrain) Act
reg.title: Prohibition Regulation No. 8
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B. C. Reg. 109/2002]

definition.def: means all terrain vehicles as defined in the Motor Vehicle (All Terrain) Act;
means the lands outlined in red in the schedule to this regulation. [Blackcomb Mountain]

section.sectiontext: No land in the designated area may be used for

paragraph.paragraphtext: the operation of an all terrain vehicle,
the operation of a ski school,
tobogganing, sledding, ski bobbing and any ski or snow recreational activity other than skiing, and

section.subsandwich: by any person other than Fortress Mountain Resorts Ltd. and its agents, employees and contractors.

section.sectiontext: The Minister of Sustainable Resource Management is authorized to sign and publish a notice prohibiting the uses set out in section 2.

lefttext.em: Schedule exempt from publication, may be inspected at the offices of the Land Management Branch, Ministry of Sustainable Resource Management, Victoria, B.C.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Land Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 245, sections 66 and 110; Motor Vehicle (All Terrain) Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 319, section 7]
